content: Tier 1 Support (First Line Support) handles initial customer contact for all inquiries. Responsibilities: Account inquiries, balance checks, plan information, basic troubleshooting, bill payments, package activations, SIM-related queries, general information. Average handling time: 3-5 minutes. Resolution target: 70% first-call resolution.

Tier 1 Support can help with: Check account balance and usage, Explain bills and charges, Process payments, Activate/deactivate packages, Reset voicemail PIN, Update contact information, Explain service features, Troubleshoot basic connectivity issues, Register complaints, Schedule callbacks.

Tier 2 Support (Technical Support) handles escalated technical issues that require deeper investigation. Responsibilities: Network connectivity issues, Speed problems, Router/modem configuration, Advanced troubleshooting, Service outage verification, Technical complaint handling. Average handling time: 10-15 minutes.

Tier 2 Support can help with: Diagnose network connectivity issues, Remote router configuration, Speed test analysis, Identify service outages in your area, Coordinate with field technicians, Resolve complex billing disputes, Handle plan migration issues, Technical device support, Schedule technician visits.

Tier 3 Support (Specialist Support) handles complex technical issues requiring specialized expertise. Responsibilities: Infrastructure-related issues, Persistent network problems, Advanced configurations, Enterprise solutions, Integration issues. Customers are not directly connected to Tier 3; issues are escalated internally.

Field Technicians provide on-site support for issues that cannot be resolved remotely. Services include: New connection installations, Router/ONT installations, Line fault repairs, Equipment replacement, Signal optimization, FTTH fiber termination, Outdoor unit installations. Scheduling: Appointments available 7 days a week. Standard slots: Morning (8 AM-12 PM), Afternoon (1 PM-5 PM).

Issue escalation follows a structured process: Level 1 → Level 2: Automatic if issue unresolved after 15 minutes or requires technical expertise. Level 2 → Level 3: For infrastructure issues, persistent problems, or issues requiring backend changes. Level 2 → Field: When on-site visit is required. Timeline: Tier 2 escalations within 2 hours, Tier 3 within 24 hours, Field visits within 48 hours (72 hours for rural areas).

Enterprise Support provides dedicated assistance for corporate customers. Features: Priority queue, Dedicated account team, 24/7 availability for critical issues, Proactive monitoring for enterprise circuits, SLA-backed response times, On-site support for critical infrastructure. Contact: Enterprise customers use dedicated hotline 1237.

Complaint handling process: 1) Complaint registered with unique reference number. 2) Categorized by type (Billing, Technical, Service). 3) Assigned to appropriate team. 4) Investigation within 24-48 hours. 5) Resolution or update provided. 6) Customer confirmation and closure. Escalation: Unresolved complaints escalated to supervisory level after 72 hours. For urgent matters, request supervisor callback.

LankaTel maintains service quality through: Call monitoring for quality assurance, Customer satisfaction surveys after interactions, Regular training updates for support staff, Performance metrics tracking (response time, resolution rate, customer satisfaction), Continuous improvement based on feedback.

Billing Support Team handles all payment and billing-related matters. Responsibilities: Bill explanation and breakdown, Payment processing issues, Billing dispute resolution, Refund processing, Credit adjustments, Payment plan arrangements, Tax queries, Invoice regeneration. Contact via 1236 during business hours. Complex disputes may take 5-7 business days to resolve.

Retention Team handles customers considering service cancellation. Responsibilities: Understand customer concerns, Offer retention packages and discounts, Process plan downgrades, Negotiate contract terms, Provide loyalty benefits. When to engage: Request when canceling service or expressing dissatisfaction. Authorized to offer exclusive retention deals not available through regular support.

Sales Support Team assists with new sales and upgrades. Responsibilities: New connection inquiries, Plan recommendations based on usage, Device sales and financing, Bundle package creation, Business account setup, Coverage verification. Available via 1234 Option 2 or at retail outlets. Commission-free advice on best plans for customer needs.

Social Media Support Team monitors and responds to online inquiries. Platforms: Facebook, Twitter/X, Instagram. Responsibilities: Public query responses, DM handling for account issues, Crisis communication, Brand reputation management. Response time: Within 2 hours during operating hours (9 AM - 9 PM). For account-specific issues, verification required before discussing details.

Chat Support Team handles live chat and WhatsApp inquiries. Capabilities: Similar to Tier 1 phone support, Text-based troubleshooting, Link sharing for self-help, Screen sharing for technical guidance. Advantages: Faster response, Multi-tasking friendly, Written record of conversation. Operating hours: 8 AM - 10 PM daily. Average response time: 2-3 minutes.

VIP Support Team provides premium service for high-value customers. Eligibility: Platinum and Diamond loyalty tier members, Enterprise key accounts. Benefits: Zero wait time, Direct senior agent connection, Proactive issue resolution, Personal account manager, Priority field visits, Exclusive offers preview. Contact via dedicated hotline 1230.

Fraud Investigation Team handles security-related incidents. Responsibilities: SIM swap fraud investigation, Unauthorized transaction review, Account takeover prevention, Identity verification issues, Suspicious activity alerts. Response: Immediate for active fraud, 24-hour investigation for reported incidents. Can block SIM instantly, reverse unauthorized charges after verification.

Network Operations Center (NOC) monitors network health 24/7. Responsibilities: Real-time network monitoring, Outage detection and response, Planned maintenance coordination, Capacity management, Performance optimization. Customer impact: NOC does not interact directly with customers but information is relayed through support teams. Outage updates posted on status.lankatel.lk.

Installation Coordination Team manages new connection installations. Responsibilities: Survey scheduling, Technician assignment, Installation tracking, Customer communication, Equipment dispatch, Post-installation verification. Timeline management: Urban areas 5-7 days, Suburban 7-14 days, Rural 14-21 days. Contact for installation status: 1234 Option 4.

Accessibility Support Team assists customers with special needs. Services: Extended call handling time, Screen reader compatible support, Sign language video support (appointment-based), Large print documents, Home visit arrangements for mobility-impaired. Training: All team members trained in accessibility support. Request accessibility assistance by pressing 9 after calling 1234.

Complaint Resolution Team handles escalated and unresolved complaints. Responsibilities: Complex complaint investigation, Multi-department coordination, Customer compensation decisions, Regulatory complaint response, Service recovery actions. Engagement: Auto-escalated if complaint unresolved for 72 hours or customer requests supervisor. Authority to offer goodwill credits and service adjustments.

Roaming Support Team assists customers traveling internationally. Responsibilities: Roaming activation, International rate inquiries, Lost phone/SIM abroad, Bill shock prevention, Partner network issues. Available 24/7 via +94 11 234 5678. Can activate emergency roaming, block stolen devices internationally, and arrange temporary local numbers in some countries.

Device Support Team provides technical assistance for LankaTel-sold devices. Responsibilities: Warranty claim processing, Device troubleshooting, Software update guidance, Trade-in evaluations, Repair coordination. Scope: Only devices purchased from LankaTel. Third-party devices receive basic connectivity support only. Contact via 1238 during business hours.

LankaTel Pay Support Team handles mobile wallet queries. Responsibilities: Transaction disputes, Failed transfer resolution, Merchant payment issues, Account verification, Limit increase requests, Fraud prevention. Dedicated line: 1239. In-app chat available. Transaction reversal within 24-48 hours for valid disputes.

LankaTel support staff undergo rigorous training: Initial training: 4 weeks classroom + 2 weeks shadowing. Certification: Product knowledge test, Communication skills assessment. Ongoing: Monthly updates on new products/services, Quarterly refresher training. Specialization: Tier 2 requires 6 months Tier 1 experience + technical certification. All agents certified before customer interaction.
